snippet: If Floyd Mayweather Jr. and Manny Pacquiao never fight, boxing fans will be denied a matchup of two of the top stars of their era.
abstract: Greg Bishop On Boxing column on Floyd Mayweather Jr, who remains undefeated after his thrilling victory over Miguel Cotto; asserts that the only real comparison to Mayweather Jr is Manny Pacquiao, and contends that if Mayweather Jr and Pacquiao never fight, boxing fans will be denied a matchup of two of the top stars of their era.
lead_paragraph: If Floyd Mayweather Jr. and Manny Pacquiao never fight, boxing fans will be denied a matchup of two of the top stars of their era.

headline.seo: Floyd Mayweather-Manny Pacquiao Bout Is Needed
headline.main: After Thrilling Win by Decision Comes Maddening Indecision
headline.print_headline: After Thrilling Win by Decision Comes Maddening Indecision
